channel.title: World object and makeGlobalObject

item.title: World object and makeGlobalObject
item.dc:creator: @TheLastViking TheLastViking
item.description:
@TheLastViking wrote:

The video sed search makeGlobalObject i did only got 1 result so i scrolled down to were the make new object thing is and its blank and this is what i have done…

public void NewObjects() {

makeGlobalObject(

}

public void OBJECTS(){} }

/WALKING TO OBJECT BEFORE DOING ACTION/

Does that look ok? and will still work?.. cos i have got a file called world object and this is what it looks like //0 = West || -1 = North || -2 = East || -3 = South
//tileObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration
//--------------------------------------------------
//-------posX—posY-----ID----face----type—Height
object = 2671 2593 -1 0 10 0 pest control no door
